snippet: With Mitt Romney now more than halfway toward the 1,144 delegates needed for the G.O.P. nomination, and President Obama engaging him, the battle lines for the general election are coming into view.
lead_paragraph: With Mitt Romney now more than halfway toward the 1,144 delegates needed for the G.O.P. nomination, and President Obama engaging him, the battle lines for the general election are coming into view.

headline.seo: The Campaign Shifts to the General Election
headline.main: The Campaign Shifts to the General Election
